metadata.Title: CVE-2019-17018 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: When in Private Browsing Mode on Windows 10, the Windows keyboard may retain word suggestions to improve the accuracy of the keyboard. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 72.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine mdeslaur> windows-specific

criterions.comment: mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
